  • Method Details

    • addGrade

      public void addGrade(Semester semester, Subject subject, Grade grade)
      Method that adds grades to report card. firstly we check if the semester has been added if not - we add it ourselves then put in in grades HashMap and finalGrades HashMap
      Parameters:
      semester - - semester we're working with
      subject - - subject
      grade - - grade

    • changeGrade

      public boolean changeGrade(Semester semester, Subject subject, Grade newGrade)
      Method changes already existing grade. for example student repass the exam with better mark or the teacher got mad and decreased the grade.
      Parameters:
      semester - - semester we're working with
      subject - - subject
      newGrade - - new grade
      Returns:
      boolean value - did we change the mark

      public double getTotalAverage()

      Returns:
      double value

    • possibilityOfRedDiploma

      public boolean possibilityOfRedDiploma()
      Method calculates the possibility of getting red diploma. if we got even one mark less than 4 then we cannot get red diploma for sure also we should consider the subjects we haven't got a grade for yet so we need to find all subjects except for ones with ExamType.PASS (named them significantSubjects) also we look through all the subjects for "Qualifying work" it student got less than 5 for it, he also cannot get a red diploma in other ways we just check that number of fours is not larger than 25% of all grades
      Returns:
      boolean value - is it possible or not.

    • possibilityOfBonusScholarship

      public boolean possibilityOfBonusScholarship()
      Method calculates the possibility of an extra scholarship. in my implementation - we can get it if we only have 4 and 5 as "meaning" marks
      Returns:
      boolean value - can we get it or not

      public String toString()
      toString() method override.
